title: Can't install on fresh Ubuntu 16.04 Xenial System

labels.name: T-infra
labels.description: Relevant to the infrastructure team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
Retried many times during the last hour. This is brand new Ubuntu install.

```
$ rm -Rf ~/.multirust ~/.rustup ~/.cargo

$ curl https://sh.rustup.rs -sSf >~/install-rust.sh

$ sha256sum install-rush.sh
22aa1f7f4c4b9be99a9d7e13ad45b2aec6714165a0578dd5ef81ca11f55ea24e  /home/parity/install-rust.sh

$ sh install-rust.sh --verbose
```

I selected (1) to proceed.

```
verbose: creating update-hash directory: '/home/parity/.rustup/update-hashes'
verbose: installing toolchain 'stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu'
verbose: toolchain directory: '/home/parity/.rustup/toolchains/stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu'
info: syncing channel updates for 'stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu'
verbose: creating temp root: /home/parity/.rustup/tmp
verbose: creating temp file: /home/parity/.rustup/tmp/dox_n1s4s4jgv9i9_file
verbose: downloading file from: 'https://static.rust-lang.org/dist/channel-rust-stable.toml.sha256'
verbose: downloading with curl
verbose: deleted temp file: /home/parity/.rustup/tmp/dox_n1s4s4jgv9i9_file
verbose: no update hash at: '/home/parity/.rustup/update-hashes/stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu'
verbose: creating temp file: /home/parity/.rustup/tmp/b0f7td5ap8a0fvgn_file.toml
verbose: downloading file from: 'https://static.rust-lang.org/dist/channel-rust-stable.toml'
verbose: downloading with curl
verbose: checksum passed
verbose: deleted temp file: /home/parity/.rustup/tmp/b0f7td5ap8a0fvgn_file.toml
info: latest update on 2018-01-04, rust version 1.23.0 (766bd11c8 2018-01-01)
info: downloading component 'rustc'
verbose: creating Download Directory directory: '/home/parity/.rustup/downloads'
verbose: downloading file from: 'https://static.rust-lang.org/dist/2018-01-04/rustc-1.23.0-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.xz'
verbose: downloading with curl
verbose: checksum passed
info: downloading component 'rust-std'
verbose: downloading file from: 'https://static.rust-lang.org/dist/2018-01-04/rust-std-1.23.0-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.xz'
verbose: downloading with curl
verbose: checksum passed
info: downloading component 'cargo'
verbose: downloading file from: 'https://static.rust-lang.org/dist/2018-01-04/cargo-0.24.0-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.xz'
verbose: downloading with curl
verbose: checksum passed
info: downloading component 'rust-docs'
verbose: downloading file from: 'https://static.rust-lang.org/dist/2018-01-04/rust-docs-1.23.0-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.xz'
verbose: downloading with curl
verbose: checksum passed
info: installing component 'rustc'
verbose: creating temp directory: /home/parity/.rustup/tmp/11xcgm7dimtsb764_dir
verbose: deleted temp directory: /home/parity/.rustup/tmp/11xcgm7dimtsb764_dir
info: rolling back changes
verbose: removing toolchain directory: '/home/parity/.rustup/toolchains/stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu'
error: failed to extract package
info: caused by: failed to unpack `rustc-1.23.0-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/rustc/lib/librustc_llvm-77df5c85bd03a50e.so` into `/home/parity/.rustup/tmp/11xcgm7dimtsb764_dir/rustc/lib/librustc_llvm-77df5c85bd03a50e.so`
info: caused by: lzma data error
```

Hope this --verbose log is sufficient to help you diagnose. Also tried beta release which fails too. Thanks.
